name: Eternal showdown
description:
You play as a warrior stuck in a deadly duel with themselves. Every victory is also a defeat in this cursed world. Destroy the source of the magic to lift the curse.

Xbox Controller recommended, keyboard supported:

Controller : A to jump, X to use your sword. Move with left stick. Start to open pause menu.

Keyboard: Space bar to jump, Shift to use your sword. Move with A and D. Esc to open pause menu.

Made in 72h for the Wowie Jam 3.0. Theme was Failure is progress : Let's mess with the concepts of winning and losing.

Credits to Aiva for the amazing AI generated music.
